name: Tanks Online io Blitz War 3D
description:
Play in new multiplayer game Tanks Online io Blitz War 3D!

Drive your tank, shoot down the enemies and protect from bullets!
The tank wars have begun, panzer general! Prepare for impact, the enemy army is close behind!
The objective of the game is to control your war machine around a colored area, search and destroy other tanks for higher score and upgrades.
**HOW TO PLAY** Use the left controller to drive a tank. Use the right controller to reset the turret's position.
Game features:
+ ONLINE military strategy game!
+ tank battle arena!
+ such a simple control – enjoy the game!
+ game that you can play with your friends!
+ like io tank game!

Become the greatest tank commander with Tank Io Online War! And dominate the world of tanks!
Ready steady bang!!
